metadata.title: Resin Work - Professional Resin Solutions
metadata.description: Leading provider of high-quality resin solutions for dental, jewellery, and functional applications.
metadata.keywords: resin, dental resin, jewellery resin, functional resin, filaments, 3D printing

slide1.heading:

tab1.title: Research and Development
tab1.heading: In-House R&D
tab1.content: Our in-house R&D facility located in Germany & India is a hub of innovation, where advanced materials science meets industry-driven solutions to create groundbreaking 3D printing resins. By pushing the boundaries of performance and customization, we empower industries to achieve unprecedented results in additive manufacturing.

tab2.title: Manufacturing
tab2.heading: In-House Manufacturing
tab2.content: With state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities, we deliver consistent, high-quality 3D printing resins at scale. Our production processes combine precision engineering with rigorous quality control, ensuring each batch meets the exacting standards demanded by industrial applications across diverse sectors.

tab3.title: CDMO

tab3.content: Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization. With state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities, we deliver consistent, high-quality 3D printing resins at scale. Our production processes combine precision engineering with rigorous quality control, ensuring each batch meets the exacting standards demanded by industrial applications across diverse sectors.

tab4.title: Technology

Our production processes combine precision engineering with rigorous quality control, ensuring each batch meets the exacting standards demanded by industrial applications across diverse sectors.

LogoAnimation.heading: Fast, efficient, reliable 3D printing solutions
LogoAnimation.content: At Resinwork, we provide cutting-edge 3D printing resins designed to deliver high-quality, precise results with speed and consistency. Whether you're in manufacturing, prototyping, or product development, our solutions are engineered to meet the demands of any industry - helping you innovate faster and more efficiently.

GradientText.text: Precision, reliability, and innovation are the cornerstones that define RESINWORK. Proudly developed in Germany, each formulation is the result of extensive in-house. Where cutting-edge technology meets our state-of-the-art manufacturing process. Trusted by professionals across industries like Dental, Engineering, Jewellery and more. We enable you to achieve outstanding results, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in 3D Printing.

DentalHeroSection.heading: The Next Big Thing in Digital Dentistry
DentalHeroSection.subheading: In‑office dental 3D printing helps improve the efficiency of forward‑thinking practices all over the world.
DentalHeroSection.description: By leveraging existing technologies that exist in digital dentistry, 3D printing enables better responsiveness to patient needs, significantly reduces manufacturing times, and opens up new treatment options. With low operating costs, minimal maintenance, and user‑friendly design, Resinwork products make it easy to bring digital dentistry and 3D printing together in your practice.

model_3.name: MODEL 3
model_3.subTitle: 3D Photopolymer Dental resin for vacuum/pressure thermoforming
model_3.description: Resinwork® Model 3 is an advanced, IPA & water‑washable 3D printing resin engineered specifically for dental thermoforming applications. Designed to deliver high thermal resistance and dimensional accuracy, Model 3 ensures reliable performance under vacuum and pressure forming conditions. Formulated with Resinwork's proprietary Anti‑Stick Surface Chemistry, Model 3 enables effortless removal of thermoformed appliances—such as retainers, aligners, nightguards, and sportguards—without damage. This unique surface release property significantly reduces the risk of breakage and enhances workflow efficiency in dental labs. Unlike conventional resins, Model 3 features a stable, matte finish that resists sticking to heated substrates and ensures consistent results. Its high pigment stability eliminates the need for frequent mixing, while its water‑washable composition provides safe, eco‑friendly handling—no alcohol or chemical cleaners required. Whether you're fabricating clear aligners or custom appliances, Resinwork® Model 3 is your go‑to solution for dependable, lab‑grade performance.

0.title: IPA & Water Washable
0.description: Resinwork® Model 3 is an advanced, IPA & water‑washable 3D printing resin engineered specifically for dental thermoforming applications. Designed to deliver high thermal resistance and dimensional accuracy, Model 3 ensures reliable performance under vacuum and pressure forming conditions.

1.title: Anti‑Stick Formula
1.description: Formulated with Resinwork's proprietary Anti‑Stick Surface Chemistry, Model 3 enables effortless removal of thermoformed appliances—such as retainers, aligners, nightguards, and sportguards—without damage. This unique surface release property significantly reduces the risk of breakage and enhances workflow efficiency in dental labs.

2.title: Thermoformable & Heat‑Resistant
2.description: Unlike conventional resins, Model 3 features a stable, matte finish that resists sticking to heated substrates and ensures consistent results. Its high pigment stability eliminates the need for frequent mixing, while its water‑washable composition provides safe, eco‑friendly handling—no alcohol or chemical cleaners required.

3.title: Lab Grade
3.description: Whether you're fabricating clear aligners or custom appliances, Resinwork® Model 3 is your go‑to solution for dependable, lab‑grade performance.

model_2.name: MODEL 2
model_2.subTitle: Water‑Washable Photopolymer for Dental Modelling
model_2.description: Resinwork® Model 2 is a water‑washable photopolymer (light‑curable) resin for 3D printing dental models—ideal for study models, removable die‑models, or thermoforming aligners and retainers. It features a gypsum‑like texture with excellent dimensional accuracy, low shrinkage, and high detail resolution, all at a low cost per part.

0.title: Water Washable
0.description: Unlike traditional resins that require alcohol or other solvents for post‑processing, Resinwork® Model 2 can be easily cleaned with just water, simplifying the workflow, reducing chemical usage, and ensuring a safer and more environmentally friendly operation.

1.title: Exceptional Dimensional Accuracy
1.description: Formulated with minimal shrinkage properties, Resinwork® Model 2 ensures highly accurate models with precise fitment—critical for producing reliable dental appliances and ensuring patient comfort.

2.title: Thermoformable & Heat‑Resistant
2.description: The cured resin maintains structural integrity under heat and pressure, making it perfectly suited for vacuum forming processes to fabricate clear aligners, mouthguards, and retainers.

3.title: Excellent Accuracy
3.description: Digitally build wax‑up models to show patients the results they can look forward to based on your treatment plans.

surgical_guide.name: Surgical Guides
surgical_guide.subTitle: 3D print highly-accurate surgical guides for just a few dollars.
surgical_guide.description: Receive all the clinical benefits of guided surgery with rapid turnaround times and minimal material cost by printing guides in-office. Upload your scan and CBCT data to Resinwork® Cloud Design and receive printable 3D files designed specifically for Resinwork® Pro. 3D print the surgical guide in as little as 30 minutes. Immediately insert surgical guide sleeves post-print for increased precision, then post‑process and sterilize. Resinwork® Surgical Guide 2 resin features excellent mechanical properties and can be sterilized using standard autoclave protocols without affecting dimensional accuracy.

0.title: Full‑Arch Surgical Guides
0.description: With Resinwork® Pro, you can fabricate surgical guides of all kinds, including full‑arch multi‑site implant guides, bone reduction guides, and more.

1.title: Quadrant Implant Guides
1.description: For single‑unit dental implants, 3D printing provides a rapid, repeatable workflow for the production of implant guides. Simply scan, order your design with Dashboard Design, and fabricate your FDA‑compliant guide.

2.title: Fabricate Precision
2.description: A recent university study found Resinwork® Pro more accurate and consistent than traditional alginate methods.

3.title: Economical

splints.name: Splints & Night Guards
splints.subTitle: Grow your practice with the most approachable workflow in 3D printing
splints.description: Help fight the rise in grinding and clenching by delivering more night guards with Resinwork. Featuring the industry's easiest workflow including AI design, 3D printing, and simple post processing, you can go from scan to place in less than an hour. With long‑lasting materials that become flexible at body temperature and a no‑CAD design system, protecting smiles has never been this affordable, repeatable, and profitable.
